content:
## n8n@0.72.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.71.0...n8n@0.72.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-07-02 - Enhanced nodes - Drift - Eventbrite Trigger - Facebook Graph API - Pipedrive - Fixed credential issue for the Execute Workflow node
